TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypeBrowserEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for representing and editing the values the Windows Workflow Foundation types in an object browser associated with a workflow designer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
This class allows users to open object browsers associated with any workflow designer and view all types and members that reside in the Windows Workflow Foundation namespaces.
